page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Over the year, Gillingham has devel- oped its industry and its transport links and recently there have been changes in local politics. Gillingham is a small country town with a few factories in and around it and con- sequently Gillingham by-pass has been replanned to relieve congestion in Gillingham High Street and to be an efficient route for heavy vehicles. This year the new Mayor and Mayoress are the well-established Mr and Mrs Hussey who own two shops in Gilling- ham. Every year in October,Gillingham has a carnival. This is where groups of children and adults, including guides and scouts, dress up in costume to parade down the High Street with the music of various bands. The Arts Work- shop produced another successful pantomime and a special sponsered -
